explanation: [0-0] In a brightly lit room, a man wearing a white top and blue jeans is bending over. He has a black baseball cap on backward, a silver watch on his left wrist. His right hand is touching the back neck of a brown and black dog while his left hand feeds a beige snack into the dog's mouth. The dog sits on a dark gray sofa. On the off-white wall hangs a black-framed photo of two young boys. The wall on the right side of the frame is covered in gray wallpaper. Behind the man is a transparent glass coffee table with a purple tablecloth.

[0-4] Suddenly, the man hears a sound and runs toward the window, the dog gets off the sofa. The camera follows the man as he stands on tiptoe, looking downstairs, then turns around and pulls his collar up with both hands. The scene switches, the man, now in a black top, is running and throws the white top towards the upper left corner of the frame. He has a serious expression, fingers interlocked, arms swinging back and forth as he runs. The scene widens, revealing a gray wall with three picture frames, a black leather sofa on the wooden floor, a green plant by the window, and a black and white cabinet next to a white one, both topped with various ornaments. As the camera moves along, a portrait and a gold-framed, white-faced decorative piece come into view on the wall, along with a white table.

[0-4] Suddenly, the man hears a sound and runs toward the window, the dog gets off the sofa. The camera follows the man as he stands on tiptoe, looking downstairs, then turns around and pulls his collar up with both hands. The scene switches, the man, now in a black top, is running and throws the white top towards the upper left corner of the frame. He has a serious expression, fingers interlocked, arms swinging back and forth as he runs. As the camera moves along, a portrait and a gold-framed, white-faced decorative piece come into view on the wall, along with a white table.

The scene widens, revealing a gray wall with three picture frames, a black leather sofa on the wooden floor, a green plant by the window, and a black and white cabinet next to a white one, both topped with various ornaments. As the camera moves along, a portrait and a gold-framed, white-faced decorative piece come into view on the wall, along with a white table.

[4-11] The scene changes, the man opens the door from outside and rushes in, pulling open a grayish-white wardrobe with both hands. A brightly colored Spiderman costume is pulled out from the wardrobe along with its hanger and thrown onto the bed. The bed is covered with pink sheets and a neatly folded white quilt. A white nightstand sits to the left of the bed. The man lifts the costume with both hands, looks at it, then gestures towards himself - instantly, the costume is on him. He twists his body and limbs, then raises his hands to his sides, makes a fist, turns around, opens the door and runs out. The scene changes to the man running out of the room.

[11-21] The scene shifts again, and he arrives at another door, throws open the white door and rushes out. He stops, slides forward a short distance, then clasps his hands behind his head, his legs slightly bent. Turning around, he looks shocked, placing his hands on his face and slapping it twice. He lifts his head, looking upwards, his left index finger pointing at the air. The screen turns white. Cut to the man in the Spiderman costume sitting dejectedly on the toilet with the Spiderman mask on the toilet tank. The scene cuts back to the previous setting, the man holds his head in his hands with a shocked expression, then runs forward. Cut again, the man opens a white door, about to rush in. Another cut shows him standing in front of the toilet, legs bent, hands moving from his head to his face, finally covering his mouth as he stares in shock at the mask pinned under a gray hammer. He reaches out with both hands, trying to pull the mask out, but fails. Frowning, he cradles his head in pain, swaying from side to side. Releasing his head, he runs out again.

[21-27] The scene changes to the man, frowning and with wide eyes, holding a piece of clothing in each hand and throwing them backward one after another. A white square lamp hangs above his head, emitting a faint yellow light. The scene cuts again to the man standing in front of a white cabinet with a drawer pulled open. He holds a mask in his left hand, grabs a hat with his right hand and throws it away. Quickly, he puts on a scary mask with painted teeth, eyes, and tongue with both hands. He then gets up and runs away swiftly.

[27-33] Cut to the man sliding to a stop in front of a white door. He spreads his legs, twists the handle with his right hand and runs out. He sprints to a window, rests his right hand on the window sill, and pushes the window open with his left hand. He then supports himself with both hands on the window sill, crouches down, and jumps up. The screen goes black.
